chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.```", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:


Goal:
forall (A : Set) (f : Map A -> Map A) (x : Map A) (n : nat) (y : prechain A) (z : Map A), iteres A f x n = concat A y z -> z = f (prechain_last A y)

Premises:
Inductive prechain (A : Set) : Set := single : Map A -> prechain A | concat : prechain A -> Map A -> prechain A For prechain: Argument scope is [type_scope] For single: Argument scopes are [type_scope _] For concat: Argument scopes are [type_scope _ _]
iteres : forall A : Set, (Map A -> Map A) -> Map A -> nat -> prechain A
prechain_last : forall A : Set, prechain A -> Map A
concat : forall A : Set, prechain A -> Map A -> prechain A
Inductive GFormula (TA TX AA AF : Type) : Type := TT : Tauto.GFormula | FF : Tauto.GFormula | X : TX -> Tauto.GFormula | A : TA -> AA -> Tauto.GFormula | Cj : Tauto.GFormula -> Tauto.GFormula -> Tauto.GFormula | D : Tauto.GFormula -> Tauto.GFormula -> Tauto.GFormula | N : Tauto.GFormula -> Tauto.GFormula | I : Tauto.GFormula -> option AF -> Tauto.GFormula -> Tauto.GFormula For GFormula: Arguments TA, TX, AA, AF are implicit and maximally inserted For TT: Arguments TA, TX, AA, AF are implicit and maximally inserted For FF: Arguments TA, TX, AA, AF are implicit and maximally inserted For X: Arguments TA, TX, AA, AF are implicit
Inductive nat : Set := O : nat | S : nat -> nat For S: Argument scope is [nat_scope]
Inductive Map (A : Type) : Type := M0 : Map A | M1 : ad -> A -> Map A | M2 : Map A -> Map A -> Map A For Map: Argument scope is [type_scope] For M0: Argument scope is [type_scope] For M1: Argument scopes are [type_scope _ _] For M2: Argument scopes are [type_scope _ _]
iteres_eq : forall (A : Set) (f : Map A -> Map A) (x : Map A) (n : nat), iteres A f x n = iteres_0 A f x n
lazy_power_eg_power_0 : forall (A : Set) (egalite : Map A -> Map A -> bool) (f : Map A -> Map A) (x : Map A) (n : nat), (forall a b : Map A, egalite a b = true <-> a = b) -> forall z : Map A, (lazy_power_aux A egalite f x n = flag_true A z -> z = power (Map A) f x n /\ z = f z) /\ (lazy_power_aux A egalite f x n = flag_false A z -> z = power (Map A) f x n)
iteres_eq_0 : forall (A : Set) (f : Map A -> Map A) (x : Map A) (n : nat), prechain_last A (iteres A f x n) = power (Map A) f x n
dist_concat_m : forall (A : Set) (x y : Map A) (z : prechain A), x <> y -> dist_chain A (concat A z x) -> dist_chain A (concat A (concat A z x) y)
lazy_power_eg_power : forall (A : Set) (egalite : Map A -> Map A -> bool) (f : Map A -> Map A) (x : Map A) (n : nat), (forall a b : Map A, egalite a b = true <-> a = b) -> lazy_power A egalite f x n = power (Map A) f x n
iteres_ult_const_4 : forall (A : Set) (f : Map A -> Map A) (x : Map A) (n : nat), non_dist_chain A (iteres A f x n) -> exists p : nat, S p <= n /\ power (Map A) f x p = power (Map A) f x (S p)
power_def_ok : forall (A : Set) (T : mEnsemble A) (f : Map A -> Map A) (x : Map A) (n : nat), def_ok_app A T f -> T x -> T (power (Map A) f x n)
non_dist_concat_m_tl : forall (A : Set) (x y : Map A) (z : prechain A), non_dist_chain A (concat A z x) -> non_dist_chain A (concat A (concat A z x) y)
iteres_def_ok : forall (A : Set) (T : mEnsemble A) (f : Map A -> Map A) (x : Map A) (n k : nat), def_ok_app A T f -> T (power (Map A) f x n) -> T (power (Map A) f x (n + k))
iteres_ult_const_2 : forall (A : Set) (x y : Map A) (z : prechain A), non_dist_chain A (concat A z x) -> iteres_ult_const_def_0 A (concat A z x) -> iteres_ult_const_def_0 A (concat A (concat A z x) y)
dist_compl_7 : forall (A : Set) (x y : Map A) (z : prechain A), non_dist_chain A (concat A z x) -> ~ dist_chain A (concat A z x) -> ~ dist_chain A (concat A (concat A z x) y)
chain_concat_m : forall (A : Set) (x y : Map A) (z : prechain A) (T : mEnsemble A) (r : mRelation A), T y -> r x y -> chain A T r (concat A z x) -> chain A T r (concat A (concat A z x) y)
non_dist_chain_ind : forall (A : Set) (P : prechain A -> Prop), (forall x : Map A, P (concat A (single A x) x)) -> (forall (x : Map A) (z : prechain A), P (concat A (concat A z x) x)) -> (forall (x y : Map A) (z : prechain A), non_dist_chain A (concat A z x) -> P (concat A z x) -> P (concat A (concat A z x) y)) -> forall p : prechain A, non_dist_chain A p -> P p
MapSweep_semantics_1 : forall (A : Type) (f : ad -> A -> bool) (m : Map A) (a : ad) (y : A), MapSweep A f m = Some (a, y) -> f a y = true
dist_chain_ind : forall (A : Set) (P : prechain A -> Prop), (forall x : Map A, P (single A x)) -> (forall x y : Map A, x <> y -> P (concat A (single A x) y)) -> (forall (x y : Map A) (z : prechain A), x <> y -> dist_chain A (concat A z x) -> P (concat A z x) -> P (concat A (concat A z x) y)) -> forall p : prechain A, dist_chain A p -> P p
prechain_sum : forall (A : Set) (p : prechain A), (exists x : Map A, p = single A x) \/ (exists (x : Map A) (y : prechain A), p = concat A y x)
MapSweep_semantics_2 : forall (A : Type) (f : ad -> A -> bool) (m : Map A) (a : ad) (y : A), MapSweep A f m = Some (a, y) -> MapGet A m a = Some y
MapFlag_sum : forall (A : Set) (f : MapFlag A), exists x : Map A, f = flag_true A x \/ f = flag_false A x
non_dist_concat_m_hd : forall (A : Set) (x : Map A) (z : prechain A), non_dist_chain A (concat A (concat A z x) x)
iteres_ult_const_1 : forall (A : Set) (x : Map A) (z : prechain A), iteres_ult_const_def_0 A (concat A (concat A z x) x)
chain_ind : forall (A : Set) (P : mEnsemble A -> mRelation A -> prechain A -> Prop), (forall (x : Map A) (T : mEnsemble A) (r : mRelation A), T x -> P T r (single A x)) -> (forall (x y : Map A) (T : mEnsemble A) (r : mRelation A), T x -> T y -> r x y -> P T r (concat A (single A x) y)) -> (forall (x y : Map A) (z : prechain A) (T : mEnsemble A) (r : mRelation A), T y -> r x y -> chain A T r (concat A z x) -> P T r (concat A z x) -> P T r (concat A (concat A z x) y)) ->...-> P m m0 p
dist_compl_6 : forall (A : Set) (x : Map A) (z : prechain A), ~ dist_chain A (concat A (concat A z x) x)
Inductive non_dist_chain (A : Set) : prechain A -> Prop := non_dist_concat_s : forall x : Map A, non_dist_chain A (concat A (single A x) x) | non_dist_concat_m_hd : forall (x : Map A) (z : prechain A), non_dist_chain A (concat A (concat A z x) x) | non_dist_concat_m_tl : forall (x y : Map A) (z : prechain A), non_dist_chain A (concat A z x) -> non_dist_chain A (concat A (concat A z x) y) For non_dist_chain: Argument scopes are [type_scope _] For non_dist_concat_s: Argument scopes are [type_scope _] For non_dist_concat_m_hd: Argument scopes are [type_scope _ _] For non_dist_concat_m_tl: Argument scopes are [type_scope _ _ _ _]
Inductive dist_chain (A : Set) : prechain A -> Prop := dist_single : forall x : Map A, dist_chain A (single A x) | dist_concat_s : forall x y : Map A, x <> y -> dist_chain A (concat A (single A x) y) | dist_concat_m : forall (x y : Map A) (z : prechain A), x <> y -> dist_chain A (concat A z x) -> dist_chain A (concat A (concat A z x) y) For dist_chain: Argument scopes are [type_scope _] For dist_single: Argument scopes are [type_scope _] For dist_concat_s: Argument scopes are [type_scope _ _ _] For dist_concat_m: Argument scopes are [type_scope _ _ _ _ _]
MapCollect_as_Fold : forall (A B : Type) (f : ad -> A -> Map B) (m : Map A), MapCollect A B f m = MapFold A (Map B) (M0 B) (MapMerge B) f m

```coq
intros A f x n y z H.
induction y.
- simpl in H. inversion H. subst. auto.
- simpl in H. apply iteres_eq_0 in H. rewrite <- H. auto.
Qed.

original: intros A f x n y z H. induction y. - simpl in H. inversion H. subst. auto. - simpl in H. apply iteres_eq_0 in H. rewrite <- H. auto.
